text: Beloye () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Beloselskoye Rural Settlement of Krasnogvardeysky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 3088 as of 2018. There are 31 streets.Улицы села Белое == Geography == The village is located on the right bank of the Belaya. == Ethnicity == The village is inhabited by Russian, Kurds, Adygs, Azerbaijanis, Armenians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Krasnogvardeysky District
title: Beloye, Adygea
